data.name: Central Processing Unit (CPU)
data.description: The air hums. Corridors branch off. [DYNAMIC_EXIT_EAST]. A faint inscription reads 'Sector 0,0,0'. This appears to be some kind of nexus or entry point.

interactables.name: a sturdy metal lever
interactables.description: A heavy metal lever is set into the wall, currently in the 'up' position.

on_interact_effect.message_success_self: You pull the lever down with a CLUNK. You hear a mechanism engage nearby.
on_interact_effect.message_success_others: {character_name} pulls the lever. A distant clunk is heard.

data.name: Secure Storage Vault Epsilon
data.description: Dust motes dance in the dim light. Shelves line the walls, mostly empty. Panel E-1. [DYNAMIC_EXIT_WEST]

data.name: Dilapidated Northern Gate
data.description: A crumbling stone archway marks what might have once been a northern exit from the central complex. The path beyond is overgrown and disappears into a tangle of thorny bushes.

data.name: Overgrown Path
data.description: Thorny bushes and grasping weeds choke this narrow path. The air is damp and smells of decay. Small creatures skitter in the undergrowth.

data.name: Ruined Shack Clearing
data.description: The path opens into a small clearing where the remains of a wooden shack slowly rot. A rusty water pump stands askew nearby.

interactables.name: a rusty pump handle
interactables.description: The handle of the old water pump is stiff but might still move.

on_interact_effect.message_success_self: You work the pump handle. After a few groaning protests, a trickle of brackish water sputters out.
on_interact_effect.message_success_others: {character_name} works the pump handle, producing a trickle of murky water.

data.name: Inside Ruined Shack
data.description: The interior of the shack is damp and filled with cobwebs. Most of the roof has caved in, offering a view of the sky. A tattered mat lies in one corner.

data.name: Thorny Thicket (West)
data.description: An almost impassable thicket of thorny vines blocks easy passage further west. You can hear buzzing insects.

data.name: Thorny Thicket (East)
data.description: The thorny vines are particularly dense here, scraping at your clothes as you push through.

data.name: Rat-Infested Cellar Entrance
data.description: A collapsed section of ground near the eastern thicket reveals a dark opening leading down into what might be a cellar. It stinks of vermin. [DYNAMIC_EXIT_EAST_CELLAR_DOOR]

data.name: Deep Cellar - Main Chamber
data.description: This small, damp cellar chamber is filled with refuse and the gnawed bones of small animals. The air is heavy with the stench of rats.

data.name: Deep Cellar - Rat Nest
data.description: A particularly rank corner of the cellar, piled high with shredded cloth and filth. This is clearly a nest for something unpleasant.

data.name: Goblin Lookout Point
data.description: North of the ruined shack, the path climbs slightly to a rocky outcrop. Crude goblin symbols are daubed on the rocks.

data.name: Goblin Trail West
data.description: A crudely marked trail leads west from the lookout, littered with discarded bones and scraps of leather.

data.name: Small Goblin Camp
data.description: A small, messy encampment is hidden here, with a poorly tended fire pit and a few crude hide tents. [DYNAMIC_EXIT_WEST_CAVE]

data.name: Goblin Cave Entrance
data.description: A narrow opening in the rocks, reeking of goblin filth, leads into a dark cave.

data.name: Goblin Cave - Storage Nook
data.description: This small nook in the cave is piled with stolen junk and rotting food.

data.name: Path to the Whispering Woods
data.description: The overgrown path continues north from the goblin lookout, gradually becoming overshadowed by larger, darker trees. The air grows cooler.

data.name: Edge of the Whispering Woods
data.description: You stand at the verge of a dark and ancient forest. Twisted trees loom, their branches like skeletal fingers. The sounds of the outskirts fade behind you.

data.name: Gloomy Trail
data.description: A barely discernible trail winds deeper into the woods. Sunlight struggles to penetrate the thick canopy above.

data.name: Wolf Den Clearing
data.description: The trail opens into a small clearing. The ground is paw-printed, and a low growl emanates from a shadowed cleft in some rocks to the west.

data.name: Inside the Wolf Den
data.description: A shallow cave, littered with bones and smelling strongly of wet fur. This is undoubtedly a wolf den.

data.name: Ancient Oak
data.description: A colossal, ancient oak tree dominates this part of the woods. Its gnarled branches are draped with moss, and its roots heave up the earth.

data.name: Spider-Infested Grove
data.description: Thick, sticky webs hang between the trees here, glistening with dew. The silence is broken only by the rustling of something large in the higher branches.

data.name: Broodmother's Web
data.description: A massive, funnel-shaped web fills a hollow between several large trees. The air is thick with the smell of decay and the chitinous clicking of many legs.

data.name: Hidden Forest Shrine
data.description: Tucked away behind a curtain of ivy to the west of the ancient oak, you find a small, moss-covered stone shrine, seemingly forgotten by time. [DYNAMIC_EXIT_WEST_SHRINE_NICHE]

data.name: Shrine Niche
data.description: A small alcove within the hidden shrine. A faint, almost imperceptible humming emanates from the stone.

data.name: Path to the Old Mine
data.description: The trail grows rockier and begins to ascend slightly, heading towards a cliff face visible through the trees to the north.

data.name: Old Mine Entrance
data.description: A dark, foreboding mine entrance gapes in the cliffside. Rotting timbers support the opening, and the air smells of damp earth and something metallic. [DYNAMIC_EXIT_NORTH_MINE_GATE]

data.name: Mine Entry Tunnel
data.description: The tunnel is dark and supported by creaking wooden beams. Water drips from the ceiling, and the sound of skittering echoes from deeper within.

data.name: Foreman's Office (Ruined)
data.description: A small, caved-in chamber off the main tunnel. A rickety desk and a broken chair are all that remain of what might have been an office.

data.name: Mine Shaft Junction
data.description: The tunnel opens into a larger area where several mine shafts converge. Most are collapsed, but one leads east, and another continues deeper north.

data.name: East Vein Tunnel
data.description: This narrow tunnel follows a vein of some glittering, unfamiliar ore. The air is stale.

data.name: East Vein - Dead End
data.description: The tunnel ends abruptly in a rockfall. It seems this vein was worked out or abandoned.

data.name: Deep Mine Shaft
data.description: This shaft descends steeply into darkness. The air is noticeably colder, and an unnerving silence hangs in the air.

data.name: Undead Miners' Chamber
data.description: This large cavern is littered with broken mining tools and the skeletal remains of miners, still clad in tattered work clothes. A chilling aura pervades the room.

data.name: Crumbling Stone Bridge
data.description: North of the deepest part of the mine, a natural chasm is spanned by a dangerously weathered stone bridge. Far below, you can hear the faint sound of rushing water. The air feels charged.

data.name: Sanctum Gatehouse
data.description: Beyond the bridge stands a formidable stone gatehouse, its portcullis rusted shut. Strange symbols are carved above the archway. [DYNAMIC_EXIT_NORTH_SANCTUM_PORTCULLIS]

data.name: Corrupted Sanctum Courtyard
data.description: The flagstones of this courtyard are cracked and overgrown with sickly weeds. Defaced statues stand in alcoves, and an oppressive atmosphere hangs heavy.

data.name: Sanctum - West Wing Antechamber
data.description: A once-grand antechamber, now fallen into ruin. Tapestries hang in tatters, and dust coats every surface.

data.name: Sanctum Library (Desecrated)
data.description: Bookshelves line the walls, their contents mostly burned or torn. Pages skitter across the floor in the draft. A large, rune-covered lectern stands in the center. [DYNAMIC_EXIT_WEST_SECRET_PASSAGE]

data.name: Sanctum Secret Study
data.description: A hidden study, remarkably preserved. Books on dark arts and forbidden lore line the shelves. A single, guttering candle illuminates a desk.

data.name: Sanctum - East Wing Hallway
data.description: This hallway echoes with an unsettling silence. Doors leading off it are mostly broken or hanging from single hinges.

data.name: Sanctum Barracks (Haunted)
data.description: Rotting bunks line the walls of this former barracks. The air is icy cold, and a palpable sense of dread fills the room.

data.name: Sanctum Main Hall
data.description: A vast, domed hall that must have once been breathtaking. Now, rubble litters the floor, and ominous shadows dance in the dim light filtering from cracks in the dome.

data.name: Sanctum Altar Chamber
data.description: At the northernmost end of the sanctum lies a raised dais upon which a massive, dark stone altar stands. The air crackles with a malevolent energy. [DYNAMIC_EXIT_NORTH_ALTAR_BARRIER]

data.name: Inner Sanctum
data.description: Beyond the altar, this chamber hums with concentrated dark power. Disturbing runes cover every surface, glowing faintly.

data.name: South Maintenance Tunnel
data.description: Dimly lit and smelling faintly of burnt coffee. A heavy iron door blocks the way further south. Panel S-1. [DYNAMIC_EXIT_SOUTH_ARCHIVE]

data.name: Deep Archive Sector 42
data.description: Ancient, whirring machinery fills this chamber. It feels important. Panel S-2. [DYNAMIC_EXIT_NORTH_ARCHIVE]

data.name: West Logic Gate Array
data.description: To the west, a series of humming conduits. Panel W-1.
